<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get project by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/projects/{project_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns detailed information about a single project if the authenticated
user has access to it.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"project_id","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Project UUID","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"data":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique project identifier"},"name":{"type":"string","description":"Project name"},"description":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Project description"},"inserted_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Project creation timestamp"},"updated_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Last update timestamp"}},"title":"Project"}},"title":"ProjectResponse"}}}},"403":{"description":"Insufficient permissions","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string","example":"Forbidden"}}}}}},"404":{"description":"Resource not found","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string","example":"Not Found"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
